__TOC__
==Description==
[[File:Britaincraftingarea.png|right|250px]]
A crafter's haven! This special area, found in the north of [[Britain]], provides the following benefits to crafters:
* Adds a 10% bonus chance to craft exceptional items.
* Reduces resource use by 20%.
* Gives a chance to create [[Slayer_Types#Slayer_Weapons|Slayer Weapons]] with [[Blacksmithing]], [[Bowcraft]], [[Carpentry]] scales from ~1% at 100 crafting skill, up to ~2% at 120 skill. 
* [[Inscription]] also has a chance to create Slayer Spell Books, however you must be 120 Skill and the slayer chance is 2.5%.
* When using [[Wood|special wood types]] in the Britain Crafting Area, you will have a chance to create weapons with up to 3 magical properties. The more rare a [[Wood|wood type]] is, the better chance at greater properties!
* Gives a chance to create "a bent rod" with [[Carpentry]] when crafting fishing poles. Similar concept to making [[Slayer_Types#Slayer_Weapons|Slayer Weapons]].

===Notes===
* This is NOT a safe zone like [[Britain|West Britain]] [[Bank|Bank]]. Be on the look out for thieves and griefers luring spawn from the graveyard! If you are running a crafting macro, consider adding a line to regularly call guards.
